content: Create a series of three haikus describing the lifecycle of a butterfly, from caterpillar to chrysalis to its final transformation. Make sure to capture the essence of each phase with vivid imagery.

Emerging from an egg,

Caterpillar munches leaves,

Growth in green embrace.

Spinning silk cocoon,

Chrysalis hangs in silence,

Transformation nears.

Wings unfurl in dawn,

Butterfly takes to the sky,

Freedom in flight.
